Properties.Name: ToolTip
Properties.Value: Specifies the email address of the shared mailbox in Exchange Online that was created for email logging. The shared mailbox must be in the same tenant as Business Central.

Properties.Name: ToolTip
Properties.Value: Specifies the number of email messages that the job queue entry for email logging will get from Exchange Online in one run. By balancing this number with how often the job queue entry runs you can fine tune the process. If a message is not logged in the current run it will be in the next one.

Properties.Name: ToolTip
Properties.Value: Specifies whether email logging is enabled.

Properties.Name: ToolTip
Properties.Value: Specifies the ID of the Azure Active Directory application that will be used to connect to Exchange Online.

Properties.Name: ToolTip
Properties.Value: Specifies the Azure Active Directory application secret that will be used to connect to Exchange Online.

Properties.Name: ToolTip
Properties.Value: Specifies the redirect URL of the Azure Active Directory application that will be used to connect to Exchange Online.

Properties.Name: ToolTip
Properties.Value: Renew the token for connecting to the shared mailbox. You must sign in with an Exchange Online account that the scheduled job will use to connect to the shared mailbox and process emails. Use this to change the user, or if the token has expired.

Properties.Name: ToolTip
Properties.Value: Validate the settings for email logging.

Properties.Name: ToolTip
Properties.Value: Recreate the job queue entry that processes email messages and creates interaction log entries.

Properties.Name: ToolTip
Properties.Value: Clear all settings for email logging.

Properties.Name: ToolTip
Properties.Value: Turn data encryption on or off. Data encryption helps make sure that unauthorized users cannot read business data.

Properties.Name: ToolTip
Properties.Value: View the job queue entry that processes email messages and creates interaction log entries.

Properties.Name: ToolTip
Properties.Value: View the status and any errors that occurred while processing email messages and creating interaction log entries.

Properties.Name: InstructionalText
Properties.Value: This guide will help you set up email logging using the Microsoft Graph API to connect to a shared mailbox.

Properties.Name: InstructionalText
Properties.Value: To learn more about how to set up shared mailboxes and rules so that your organization can track email communication between sales people and external contacts, choose the link below.

Properties.Name: ToolTip
Properties.Value: The settings in Exchange Online are complete.

Properties.Name: ToolTip
Properties.Value: Indicates that the client credentials are specified and will be used to connect to the shared mailbox.

Properties.Name: Caption
Properties.Value: Client ID and secret are specified and will be used to connect to the shared mailbox

Properties.Name: ToolTip
Properties.Value: Indicates that the client ID and secret are required to connect to the shared mailbox.

Properties.Name: InstructionalText
Properties.Value: Specify the ID and secret of the Azure Active Directory application that will be used to connect to the shared mailbox.

Properties.Name: ToolTip
Properties.Value: Specifies if the Exchange administrator has logged in successfully.

Properties.Name: Tooltip
Properties.Value: Indicates that the Exchange Online administrator is not signed in.

Properties.Name: InstructionalText
Properties.Value: Sign in with an administrator account for Exchange Online and give consent to the application that will be used to connect to the shared mailbox.

Properties.Name: Tooltip
Properties.Value: Specifies the email address of the shared mailbox. The shared mailbox must be in the same tenant as Business Central.

Properties.Name: InstructionalText
Properties.Value: Click the link below to test the connection to the shared mailbox.

Properties.Name: InstructionalText
Properties.Value: Click the link below to test the connection to the shared mailbox. You will need to sign in with an Exchange Online account that the scheduled job will use to connect to the shared mailbox and process emails.

Properties.Name: ToolTip
Properties.Value: The connection test was not successful.

Properties.Name: InstructionalText
Properties.Value: Enter the number of email messages that the job queue entry for email logging will get from Exchange Online in one run. By balancing this number with how often the job queue entry runs you can fine tune the process. If a message is not logged in the current run it will be in the next one.

Properties.Name: ToolTip
Properties.Value: Specifies the number of email messages that the job queue entry for email logging will get from Exchange Online in one run. By balancing this number with how often the job queue entry runs you can fine tune the process. If a message is not logged in the current run it will be in the next one.

Properties.Name: InstructionalText
Properties.Value: Provide the email address of the shared mailbox that is configured for email logging. The shared mailbox must be in the same tenant as Business Central.

Properties.Name: ToolTip
Properties.Value: Indicates that Interaction Template Setup needs to be configurred.

Properties.Name: Caption
Properties.Value: Interaction Template Setup needs to be configurred.

Properties.Name: InstructionalText
Properties.Value: Email Logging requires correctly configured Interaction Template Setup.

Properties.Name: ToolTip
Properties.Value: Indicates that Interaction Template Setup is correctly configurred.

Properties.Name: Caption
Properties.Value: Interaction Template Setup is correctly configurred.

Properties.Name: InstructionalText
Properties.Value: When you choose Finish, the following will be created:

PermissionSetExtensions.Name: D365 BUS FULL ACCESS - Email Logging
